package collection;
import java.util.*;
public class LinkedList1 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
	  
		  LinkedList<String> al=new LinkedList<String>();  
		  al.add("Ravi");  
		  al.add("Vijay");  
		  al.add("Ravi");  
		  al.add("Ajay");  
		  
		  Iterator<String> itr=al.iterator();  
		  while(itr.hasNext()){  
		   System.out.println(itr.next());
		//Linked List
		LinkedList<String> linkedList = new LinkedList<String>();
		for(int j=0;j<5;j++)
		{
				linkedList.add("Item " + j);
		}
				
		System.out.println("\n Content of linked list " + linkedList);
		linkedList.set(1, "Item 5");
		System.out.println("\n Content of linked list " + linkedList);
		//remove()
		linkedList.remove(4);
		linkedList.addFirst("Item 6");
		linkedList.addLast("Item 7");
		linkedList.removeFirst();
		linkedList.removeLast();
		System.out.println("\n Content of linked list " + linkedList);
				
				linkedList.add("Item 1");
				linkedList.add("Item 2");
				linkedList.add("Item 1");
				//linkedlist.add(2,"Item 9");
				System.out.println("\n Content of linked list " + linkedList);
				
				linkedList.removeFirstOccurrence("Item 1");
				System.out.println("\n Content of linked list " + linkedList);
				
				linkedList.removeLastOccurrence("Item 2");
				System.out.println("\n Content of linked list " + linkedList);
				
				//Traversing list in descending order
		Iterator iterator = linkedList.descendingIterator();
				while(iterator.hasNext())
				{
					System.out.println("\n" + iterator.next());
				}
				

		  }  
		   
		

	}
}
